title: Insane ping spikes
body: Ever since patch 5.7 I've had insane ping spikes in game and my average ping has gone up by more than 50 ms.  Every other game I play is running fine.  Any help?

replies.body: Same here, my ping use to be 70-80 and now it shot up to 200-5000 ...

This hasn't been happening to me. I'm on Optus. Sure this isn't an ISP thing with League's address?

Have you tried another DNS?

Yep happened to me - on bigpond.

Also the servers seem to crash briefly a few times every night. Tonight's  just started...
